verbose_text: To identify a possible role for fluxation and surges in extracellular glutamate driving CA1 hypermetabolism in psychosis, we examined changes in extracellular glutamate and CBV induced by acute systemic administration of the NMDA receptor antagonist ketamine (8-32 mg/kg) in parallel groups of C57/B6 mice.
evidence: CBV induced by acute systemic administration of the NMDA
